content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ home services. I understand you need help with plumbing. May I have your name, please?
Nice to meet you, Margaret! Could you please provide the address where the plumbing service is needed?
Thank you, Margaret. You are within our service area. When would be your ideal time for us to come and help with the plumbing?
To be honest, I think I'll try to fix it myself first. So I won't be scheduling an appointment now. Thanks anyway.
reason: Customer decided to try fixing plumbing themselves
